#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define pb push_back
#define ft first
#define se second
#define mp make_pair
int func(int n){
	string s;
	bool yes=0;
	int cnt=-1;
	for(int i = 30; i >=0; --i){
		if((int)pow(2, i) & n) s.pb('1'), yes=1, cnt++;
		else if(yes) s.pb('0');
	}//for i
	int len=s.length()-1;
	int m=s.length();
	int v[m];
	if(s[m-1]=='1') v[m-1]=1;
	else v[m-1]=0;
	for(int k = m-2; k >=0; --k){
		if(s[k]=='1') v[k]=v[k+1]+1;
		else v[k]=v[k+1];
	}//for k --
	int ans=10000;
	for(int i = 1; i <m; ++i){
		if(s[i]!='1') continue;
		if(v[i]==0) break;
		ans=min(ans, max(len+v[0]-v[i]-1, len-i+v[i]-1));
	}//for i
	if(cnt!=len) ans=min(ans, len+v[0]-2);
	return ans;
}
int main(int argc, char const *argv[]){
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--){
    	int n;
    	scanf("%d", &n);
    	printf("%d\n", func(n));
    }
	return 0;
}
